text: Nancy Ann Grace (born October 23, 1959 in Macon, Georgia) is an American TV host, attorney and author. She hosts a celebrity TV show (also titled as Nancy Grace Live). She often discusses issues from what she calls a victim rights' standpoint. == References == Category:Lawyers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:American television presenters Category:Journalists from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:New York University alumni Category:Television personalities from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Nancy Grace
